0: Returning I was happy to see that the hotel has been well maintained and the staff are still friendly and professional
Would highly recommend this hotel We enjoyed the excellent service and the comfortable room
The hotel staff were helpful and friendly and the room was clean and spacious
Staff in all areas curtious friendly n helpful
Also very friendly and accommodating concierge
Very impressed with the service and breakfast comfortable bed tea and coffee bar in room bath room was motel standard at best
Great service from Chelsea when I left my headphones behind in my room
We were exceptionally with the service we received on arrival and for our entire stay
1: Many hotels these days have bottled water available at Concierge
Big changes in staff and food quality since the takeover by Pullman
As i was on business and we had a room on 15th floor hired for 3 days i would like to praise all the staff for there excellent support
I pay for them myself as it is my company and we exclusively use Acor for the employees as well
Reception staff were excellent during our weekday stay however it was the quite the same case on the weekend
Room service was keep and food were warm and delicious
Comfortable room let down by inattentive staff
My travel agent had booked me into the wrong Pullman and the man at reception that served me was fantastic at finding me another room
2: i was really happy with the room sevice dinning room
I been contact with the housekeeper and concierge on and before
I thought it was good service was good
I enjoy the bar the beer is cold but not having pints available is not good the bar staff are always friendly interactive with customers I find this a welcoming factor when away from friends family
We ordered room service for my 2 kids
The staff moved us however it was inconvenient as we had already unpacked
particulary Marc and Phoebe at front desk
Staff where mostly polite and engaged I had an issue with my room which was fixed immediately upon the front desk being advised
Great room attentive reception staff but restaurant and bar staff seemed confused and unsure about Platinum privileges
Great location there was no info in room about what to do in Adelaide we had lovely balcony room but no chairs to sit on out side staff were first class
3: Overall great service but does not justify a 5 star rating
4: Service is first rate and the onsite restaurant was also good too
My only displeasure was the reception smelt like a Linx can had exploded in it
Bfast was great variety but staff seemed less confident in that area seemed a bit frazzled
On the fifth day our room had no service at all no clean towels bed not made no bins emptied
I asked for it to be cleaned which the reception got onto straight away
Bookings I made for many team members all ended up with the wrong names
When I advised reception about the standard three days in the next day it was perfect
I recently forgot to take my power converter for Australia but with help from the hotel staff was able to use one at the hotel and for my meetings
If I was a seasoned traveller perhaps I would have known but as this was my first trip away I felt that more information could have been offered at the reception when I was checking in
